_header: Saint Dunstan was of England I-come of good more
Subjects: saints’ lives; Dunstan, saint, life of
Bibliographic Ghosts: Southwell, Southwell Cathedral Library 7, f. 193: prose.
_description: Life of St. Dunstan in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn dunston was of engelond icome of gode moreMiracle our lord
                    dude uor him ar he were ibore…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Swete lord seynt dunston þat oure erchebiscop wereBryng
                    ous to þe Ioie of heuene as angles þi soule bere

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint donston was of ingelond I come of gode moremeraklis oure lord
                    dede for hym ar he were I bore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& wente to þe ioye þat neuer ne chal mysseNow
                    Ihesu for þyn holy name graunt vs þat ilke blisse

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Dunston was of Engelonde i come of goode moreMiracle vr lord
                    dude for him ȝit he was vnbore…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now swete lord seint Dunston þat vre Erchebisschop
                    wereBring vs to þe Ioye of heuene as Angels þi soule bere. A.
                    M.E.N.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Seint Dunston was of enguelonde icome of guode moreMiracle ore
                    louerd dude for him þe ȝuyt he was unbore…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…And is endedai [ ]An holi þoresdai [ ]He liet him
                    clep[ ]His men þat h[ ]…
BodLauMis108.Note:
Stub, numbered f. 30*, all that is left of lost folio; ends
                    imperfectly.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Donston was of engelond come of gret moreMiracle oure lord
                    dide for him er he were y bore…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou swete lord seint donston þat oure erchebisshop
                    werebring vs to þe ioye of heuene as þe angels þi soule
                    bere
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint dunstan was of Ingelond & come of good moreMeraclis oure
                    lord dide for him or he were I bore…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Swete lord seint dunston þat oure erchebischop
                    wereBringe vs to þe ioye of heuyn as aungellis þi soule
                    bere

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
…ffor whan he muste of hys [ ]Reste hym for werinesse [
                    ]…

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein donston was of engelond icome of gode moreMiracle oure louerd
                    dude for him ar he were ibore…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou swete louerd sein donston þat oure erchebissop
                    wereBringe us to þe ioie of heuene as angles þine soule
                    bere

CamKC13.First Lines:
SEint Dunston was in Engelonde icome of gode moreMiracles oure lord
                    dude for him ȝut ar he were y bore…
CamKC13.Last Lines:
…Now seint Dunston þat oure erchebisshop her wereBring vs
                    to þilke ioie þat aungeles þi soule to bere

CamTCC605.First Lines:

                    dud for hym ar he were y bore…

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEin Donston was of engelond y come of gode moreMiracle oure lorde
                    dude for him as he were y bore…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou swete lorde sein donston þat oure erche bissop
                    wereBring vs to þe Ioye of heuene as angeles þy soule
                    bere
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto Dunstano (f. 90v, by scribe in margin beside
                    first line); Donstane (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin dunston was of ynglond icome of gode moreMiracle our lord dede for him as he were ibore…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou suete lord sein donston þat our erchebischop werebring ous to þe ioie of heuen as angeles þin soule bere
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xlii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 83v).

BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now swete lord seint dunston þat oure erthe bisichop wereBring vs to þat ioie þat angles þi soule to bere

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Dunstan was of Englond of gode kynne ycoreGod wroȝt for
                    hym myracle long er he was bore…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now swete lord saynt Dunstan þat Erch bisshop was
                    hereÞou lede vs to þe ioye of heuen þer angels þi soule
                    bere. Amen

LeedsRipon.Note:
On deposit at Brotherton Library, University of Leeds; only beginnings
                    of first 40 lines.

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Dunston was of Engelond come of good moreMiracles our lord
                    did for hym er he were ybore…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now swete lord seynt Dunstoun þat our bisshop wereBrynge
                    vs to þat ioye of heuene þer aungels þi soule bere.
                    Amen.
